title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport media) order 2023

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media, is appointed as Special Adviser to Thomas Byrne, Minister of State at 
the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with 
effect from 21 December 2022. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 February, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [57] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
